QuestData.Title: The Disturbed Earth
QuestData.Description: We are here to monitor the scars of the land, and watch for further signs of instability. While we haven't seen any yet, a cataclysmic aftershock could devastate the Barrens even further.$B$BTo the northeast, near the chasm, earth elementals rampage out of control. To soothe the earth, these need to occasionally be destroyed, and their essence returned in a ritual. If you help us do this, $c, I would be happy to reward you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 4 Disturbed Earth Fragments from Disturbed Earth Elementals.
QuestData.CompletionText: The elements must be carefully balanced, so returning the essence is key. I hope you've been collecting it...
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, friend. It's important we try to calm this earth in every way we can.
